Description_lang: Increase your Stamina by $s1, increase reputation gains from world quests by $s2 and attacks against you have a chance to enable a shield absorbing up to ${$s3*(1+$@versadmg)} damage. Every $337082t2 sec $s4% is removed healing you until depleted. Only active while outdoors in Bastion.
AuraDescription_lang: Stamina increased by $w1.World Quests reward an additional $s2 reputation.Attacks against you have a chance to grant you a shield that absorbs ${$s3*(1+$@versadmg)} damage for $337082d. Every $337082t2 sec, $s4% of the remaining shield is removed and heals you for that amount.Only active while outdoors in Bastion.
